name: The Skeleton's Survival
description:
WASD = Move

Point and Click = Shoot

Survive!

Here's a link to the same game but refined and not apart of the jam https://sulkingcrow.itch.io/skeleton-survival

This is my first ever time showing a project to someone not related to me and I was only able to work 9 hours :/ mainly due to me joining 3 days late and unavoidable situations (school, family, etc.). However it was fun and I thoroughly enjoyed it!
